720747f-a.text:
Lafayette Street, north from Duane Street (where tracks are seen), to and including Leonard Street, showing the New York Edison Co. plant and office building on the west side of the street extending from Duane to Pearl Streets. Also shown are Nos. 520 to 514 Pearl Street (right foreground), east from and including Lafayette, to but not including Centre Streets. These houses and those extending on the east side of Lafayette north to Worth Street were later demolished to make way for a small park. In the centre background is visible part of the New York Life Insurance Co. Building (with clock-tower) occupying the block from Catherine Lane
to Leonard Street.
December 1925.
Brown Brothers.
720747f-a.folder: Lafayette Street & Duane Street, Manhattan, NY

720743f-a.text:
Lafayette Street (right), north from and including Reade, to but not including Pearl Streets, showing the 21-story Court Square Building (No. 2 Lafayette Street) from Reade to Duane Streets. Also shown (left) is Reade Street, west from Lafayette Street with a portion of the Hall of Records visible in the foreground. The New York Edison Co. plant and office building is shown extending from Duane to Pearl Streets (side wall with sign on it), and on Duane Street, north side, from Lafayette to Elm
Streets.
1926.
Photograph submitted by the Court Square Building Inc.
720743f-a.folder: Lafayette Street & Reade Street, Manhattan, NY

720746f-a.text:
Lafayette Street, west side, (right), north from and including Reade, to and including Leonard Streets, showing work in progress on the foundation for the new 21-story Court Square Building, adjoining the 10-story Jones Building (only the rear of which is shown), from Reade to Duane Streets. Also shown is the New York Edison Co. office building and plant, from Duane to Pearl Streets. In the left foreground is seen Reade Street, north side, west from Lafayette, to and including Elm Streets. The New ork LLife Insurance Co. Building (with clock-tower) is visible in the right background occupying the block from Catherine Lane to Leonard Street.
1926.
Photograph Submitted by the Court Square Building Inc.
720746f-a.folder: Lafayette Street & Reade Street, Manhattan, NY

720748f-c.text:
(1)
Lafayette Street, west side, north from Duane, to Leonard Streets, as seen across Foley Square, and clearance for the Federal Courts
Buildins.
April 28, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
53E ~ 2
(2)
The same, from a view point further eastward.
April 28, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A more extensive view northward to and including Franklin Street. Prominently shown is the Nw York Life Insurance Co. Building between Catherine Lane and Leonard Street. On the extreme right appears a
portion of the Tombs, a city prtson.
310E ~ 21  October 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
